response.original_title: Our Search for Sodom and Gomorrah
response.overview: In this documentary, the Real Discoveries team visit the Dead Sea to find the remains of the infamous cities of Sodom and Gomorrah. 3900 years ago, these two cities became so evil that God destroyed them. Journey with us to discover the overwehlming evidence and the amazing architectural ruins that exists today.
response.title: Our Search for Sodom and Gomorrah
